sentences.en: After cooking the fish, pour off any excess fat.
sentences.cn: 烹完鱼后，倒掉多余的油。

sentences.en: Butchers recommend cooking meat with the fat and trimming it away later.
sentences.cn: 肉贩建议先把肉整个儿煮熟，然后再将肥肉切去。

sentences.en: Cooking with the lid on gives the food that distinctive smoky flavour.
sentences.cn: 盖上盖子做会让这种食物有一种熏制般的独特风味。

sentences.en: He did the cooking, cleaning, laundry, and home repairs.
sentences.cn: 他做饭、打扫卫生、洗衣服，还在家修修补补。

sentences.en: He made his way to the kitchen to find Francis cooking.
sentences.cn: 他走到厨房，发现弗朗西斯正在做菜。

sentences.en: He makes unfavourable comparisons between British and French cooking.
sentences.cn: 他认为与法国菜相比，英国菜相形见绌。

sentences.en: He was acutely aware of the odour of cooking oil.
sentences.cn: 他闻到一股浓浓的油烟味。

sentences.en: I thought that cooking and housekeeping were unimportant, easy tasks.
sentences.cn: 我认为做饭和料理家务微不足道，一下子就能搞定。

sentences.en: If I've had a bad day I'll work it off by cooking.
sentences.cn: 我要是哪天不顺心，就去做饭排解一下。

sentences.en: It inspired me to be more inventive with my own cooking.
sentences.cn: 它激发我在自己烹饪时更富创造性。

sentences.en: It is important to get the coals white-hot before you start cooking.
sentences.cn: 很重要的一点是要把煤块烧到白热状再开始做饭。

sentences.en: Italian plum tomatoes have a full flavour, and are best for cooking.
sentences.cn: 意大利李形番茄味道很重，最适合烹饪。

sentences.en: She had been working in a pub, cooking and waitressing.
sentences.cn: 她之前在酒吧工作，负责烹饪和招待。

sentences.en: The French are proud and highly xenophobic when it comes to cooking.
sentences.cn: 谈到烹饪，法国人会颇为得意并且极端排斥外国菜。

sentences.en: Watch them carefully as they finish cooking because they can burn easily.
sentences.cn: 就要做好时得小心看着，因为它们很容易烧糊。

sentences.en: Who will then do the cooking, the washing, the mending?
sentences.cn: 那么，谁来做饭、洗衣、缝补呢？

words.tran_cn: 炊具；烹饪用水果；窜改者
（美）野外郊游时烹调的野餐；野烹食物

trans.tran_en: Cooking is the activity of preparing food
